verbs.description: [ARG0: German Chancellor Angela Merkel] [V: said] [ARG1: U.S. President Donald Trump ’s decision to withdraw from a nuclear accord with Iran “ damages trust in the international order] . ”
German Chancellor Angela Merkel said [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] ’s decision to [V: withdraw] [ARG2: from a nuclear accord with Iran] “ damages trust in the international order . ”
German Chancellor Angela Merkel said U.S. President Donald Trump ’s decision to withdraw from a nuclear accord with Iran “ damages [V: trust] [ARG1: in the international order] . ”
